name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NFT Art Tabs: Digital Gallery by rc.xyz

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NFT Art with every new browser tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the world of digital art with our transformative Chrome extension. Each time you launch a new tab, we introduce you to a new piece of NFT artwork from your favorite artists, turning your everyday browsing into a captivating exploration of the NFT art space

If your favorite artist isn't included in this extension yet, let them know that by joining rc.xyz, they will also be automatically included in the extension.

SECURITY:
The extension can only replace the page that you see when opening a new tab (the same security message will be displayed by Chrome).

Supported artists by RC.xyz: https://rc.xyz/artists

AUTHOR:
This extension is made by rc.xyz, the unified platform that allows artists to showcase all of their minted artworks, irrespective of blockchain and contract, in one single URL along with their listings and market data.
